How?

Thrift!

 

Transparent, high-performance bridge across many programmming languages.

  • Transport
  • Protocol
  • Versioning
  • Processors

Types

The developer doesn’t need to learn another rocket science language for objects serialization or transport.

Base types

  • bool
  • byte
  • i16, signed
  • i32, signed
  • i64, signed
  • double
  • string

Structs

struct Example {  1:i32 number=10,  2:i64 bigNumber,  3:double decimals,  4:string name="thrifty"}

Containers

Exceptions

Services
